ruleset.name: Squiz - WhiteSpace
ruleset.description: Squiz coding standard sniffs related whitespace usage for structuring source files. The sniffs are general and can be widely used.

rule.name: CastSpacing
rule.description: Ensure cast statements dont contain whitespace.

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacing
rule.description: Ensures that control structures have a certain style of spacing around brackets. For other spacing styles there is the possibility of extending PHP_CodeSniffer_Standards_AbstractPatternSniff.
rule.example: // No spaces after opening bracket and no spaces before closing bracket // No blank lines at the start or the end of a control structure

rule.name: FunctionClosingBraceSpace
rule.description: Checks that there is one empty line before the closing brace of a function but zero before the closing the brace of nested functions.

rule.name: FunctionOpeningBraceSpace
rule.description: Checks that there are no blank lines after a functions opening brace and that opening braces are on the new line.

rule.name: FunctionSpacing
rule.description: Checks the separation between methods in a class or interface. Methods are expected to have two blank lines between them.

property.name: spacing
property.description: The number of blank lines between functions

rule.name: LanguageConstructSpacing
rule.description: Ensures all language constructs (without brackets) contain a single space between themselves and their content.

rule.name: LogicalOperatorSpacing
rule.description: Ensures that there is one space before and after a logical operator.

rule.name: MemberVarSpacing
rule.description: Ensures that there is one blank lines between each member declaration

rule.name: ObjectOperatorSpacing
rule.description: Ensures there is no whitespace before a ObjectOperator ( -> )

rule.name: OperatorSpacing
rule.description: Ensures that operators have one space surrounding them.

rule.name: PropertyLabelSpacing
rule.description: Javascript: Ensures that the colon in a property or label definition has a single space after it and no space before it.

rule.name: ScopeClosingBrace
rule.description: Ensures that the closing braces of scopes are on a new line and indented correctly.

rule.name: ScopeKeywordSpacing
rule.description: Ensure there is a single space after scope keywords.

rule.name: SemicolonSpacing
rule.description: Ensures that there is no whitespace before a semicolon.

rule.name: SuperfluousWhitespace
rule.description: Checks that no whitespace proceeds the first content of the file, exists after the last content of the file, resides after content on any line, or are two empty lines in functions.

property.name: ignoreBlankLines
property.description: If TRUE, whitespace rules are not checked for blank lines

rule.example: Checks that no whitespace proceeds the first content of the file, exists after the last content of the file, resides after content on any line, or are two empty lines in functions.
